oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Main Street with Trolley
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Miss Irene Brignardillo -- c/o E C Paty -- Tullahoma -- Tenn -- Hello Kiddo -- Did not receive your card until this morning 7/19 If you still want the mus-hrooms let me know. Every-body is well We had a suree time at the picnic -- Yours Ed.B."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: downtown; Main Street;
